dataset.name: radiology-mini
dataset.description: Medical radiology images with captions for VLM fine-tuning

prompt.prompt_text:
You are an expert radiographer analyzing medical images.

Provide a detailed description including:
1. Type of imaging (X-ray, CT, MRI, etc.)
2. Anatomical region shown
3. Key findings and observations
4. Any notable abnormalities or normal variants

Be accurate and clinically relevant.
